 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁטַף‎</span> **verb** ==overflow, rinse or wash off== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, so Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁטַף‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***š atâpu***</u></abbr>, ***overflow***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, [[BDB#Cuche|Cuche]]); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Isa.8.8|Isa 8:8]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁטֹף‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.38|1Kgs 22:38]], etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺטֵף‎</span> [[Isa.10.22|Isa 10:22]] +, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁטְפִים‎</span> [[Isa.28.2|Isa 28:2]] — 

**1.** ***overflow***, of river [[Isa.8.8|Isa 8:8]]; [[Jer.47.2|Jer 47:2]]a (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחַל‎</span>), [[Dan.11.10|Dan 11:10]]; [[Dan.11.40|Dan 11:40]], all figurative of invading army, compare [[Isa.28.15|Isa 28:15]] (qy. by [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>ThLz, Apr. 1894, 235</sup>, [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺט שֹׁטֵט‎</span>), v[[Isa.28.18|Isa 28:18]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺט‎</span>), also (simile of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> in judgment) v[[Isa.28.2|Isa 28:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span>), [[Isa.30.28|Isa 30:28]], of judicial destruction, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺטֵף צְדָקָה‎</span> [[Isa.10.22|Isa 10:22]] with accusative of land [[Jer.47.2|Jer 47:2]]b, person (figurative) [[Isa.43.2|Isa 43:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְהָרוֺת‎</span>), [[Ps.69.3|Ps 69:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבֹּלֶת‎</span>), v[[Ps.69.16|Ps 69:16]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>), [[Ps.124.4|Ps 124:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span>), compare [[Isa.28.17|Isa 28:17]]; [[Song.8.7|Song 8:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶּשֶׁם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺטֵף‎</span> ***flooding rain*** (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s judgement) [[Ezek.11.11|Ezek 11:11]]; [[Ezek.11.13|Ezek 11:13]]; [[Ezek.38.22|Ezek 38:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחַל שׁוֺטֵף‎</span> [[Isa.66.12|Isa 66:12]], simile, in good sense. — Abs. [[Dan.11.26|Dan 11:26]] see **Niph\`al** — Figurative of ***dashing, rushing*** horse, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּמִּלְחָמָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּסוּס שׁוֺ‎</span> [[Jer.8.6|Jer 8:6]]. 

**2.** ***flow, run***, literal of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחַל‎</span> [[Ps.78.20|Ps 78:20]]; [[2Chr.32.4|2Chr 32:4]]. 

**3.** literally, ***rinse*** or ***wash off***, with accusative of thing washed [[1Kgs.22.38|1Kgs 22:38]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּמָּ֑יִם‎</span> [[Lev.15.11|Lev 15:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); of stain [[Ezek.16.9|Ezek 16:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעָלַיִךְ‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָחַץ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲפַראָֿ֑רֶץ‎</span> [[Job.14.19|Job 14:19]]. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁטֵף בַּמַּיִם‎</span> [[Lev.15.12|Lev 15:12]] ***be rinsed out, off*** ([[BDB#P|P]]; of wooden vessel); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּֽׁטְפוּ מִלְּפָנָיו‎</span> [[Dan.11.22|Dan 11:22]] ***be swept away*** (defeated), read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁטֵף‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁטֹף‎</span>), also v[[Dan.11.26|Dan 11:26]] (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמֹרַק וְּשֻׁטַּף בַּמָּ֑יִם‎</span> [[Lev.6.21|Lev 6:21]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***it shall be scoured and rinsed***.
